__e: As I look at you right now I see a grown woman who has seen all the magic in the world come true tonight.
But looking at you now, all I can see... is beast.
I have only to look at your face now to know it is true.
For the first time in my life... it's- it's not easy to talk to you- even to look at you.
And I know you're sorry, but sometimes it's just hard to look you in the face.
The person responsible for this crime can look at you right in the eye-- can look at a camera and say that "I didn't do it."
After what my son did to you... how can I look you in the face?
Because I'm about to say something serious and I can't do it if I have to look you in the eye.
After what my son did to you... how can I look you in the face?
Because I'm about to say something serious and I can't do it if I have to look you in the eye.
The only reason I make those things for you is because I know how much you love looking at yourself.
I can do the shake, tell you don't love me no more!
I don't want to talk to you, I don't even want to look at you, and I sure as hell don't want to be your friend.
I don't want to hear your voice, I don't want to talk to you, I don't even want to look at you,
I mean, it gets to the point where you can't even look at yourself in the mirror.
Well, tonight everyone's gonna see you in a whole new light.
I don't expect you to understand now, but one day you're gonna wake up and you're gonna look in the mirror and you're gonna see someone who's not all that different from me.
